dashboard.description: Product performance, pricing analysis, and promotional ROI dashboard

widgets.title: Category Performance (Last 30 Days)
widgets.query: SELECT c.category_name, SUM(s.total_amount) as revenue FROM sales s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE s.sale_date >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS GROUP BY c.category_name ORDER BY revenue DESC

widgets.title: Top Products by Revenue
widgets.query: SELECT p.product_name, SUM(s.total_amount) as revenue, SUM(s.quantity) as units FROM sales s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE s.sale_date >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS GROUP BY p.product_name ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 20

widgets.title: Promotion Performance
widgets.query: SELECT promotion_name, promotion_revenue, target_revenue, performance_rating FROM promotional_performance ORDER BY promotion_revenue DESC LIMIT 10
